decision_conditions: Prior to the commencement of development above ground, documentary evidence must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to show that the development will achieve an increase in overall green space coverage of at least 10% and an improved Green Space Factor (GSF) score of at least +0.2 compared to the baseline GSF score prior to redevelopment. The council's GSF scoring system set out in the council's 'Technical Guidance Note - Building a Sustainable Sutton' (June 2018) must be used for this purpose. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and thereafter retained.Reason: To comply with Policy 33 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018
